data.eml:eml: Collembola of Padimeiskie lakes territory on the Bolshezemelskaya tundra (European North-East Russia)

This is Sampling Event dataset. It consists of occurrence and abundance data of 44 species, 31 genus, 12 families of Collembola. The study was carried out in July 2013, in the Padimeiskie lakes territory on the Bolshezemelskaya tundra. Here one can find 15 sampling events with 127 occurrences.
